mapper.select: select s.id as board_id, s.title as title, a.appointment_start as appointment_start, a.appointment_end as appointment_end from appointment as a left join sharing_board as s on a.board_id = s.id where not_share_user_id = #{userId};
SELECT * FROM room where share_user_id = #{shareUserId} or not_share_user_id = #{notShareUserId};
SELECT r.* from (select * from room where share_user_id = #{userId} or not_share_user_id = #{userId}) r where board_id = #{boardId} and type = #{type}
